output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240015 is present, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions two presidential candidates: - Elena Lasconi (USR) - Ludovic Orban (Forța Dreptei)
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, it's a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement - Uses inclusive language ("Hai să facem istorie împreună!") - Calls for collective action
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral intent to influence voters - Explicitly promotes Elena Lasconi as "singurul candidat capabil" - Uses campaign slogans and calls to action - Directly encourages voting strategy ("Turul 1 = Turul decisiv!")
5. Journalism: - Not journalistic content - Clearly campaign material with persuasive language - Contains political messaging rather than objective reporting
6. Personal opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but a structured campaign message - Contains CMF number - Paid advertisement with clear campaign objectives
This is clearly electoral propaganda for the presidential election, which is not allowed after the campaign period has ended.
28450776881176277
This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Paid advertisement - Clear call to action for voting - Uses campaign slogans and messaging - Strategic voting instructions
TRUE
ELENA-VALERICA LASCONIPOSITIVE LUDOVIC ORBANPOSITIVE
USR
Rus Marinel, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 28450776881176277) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, continand indemnuri explicite de vot pentru candidatul USR Elena Lasconi la alegerile prezidentiale. Materialul contine numar CMF (11240015), mesaje directe de sustinere electorala, strategii de vot ("Turul 1 = Turul decisiv!") si indemnuri clare pentru mobilizarea la vot, fiind distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 1000-1999 de afisari.
